entry.title: The beginning of it all
entry.summary:
Author: notemrys

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 823Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 0

Summary: We all know the legend of Merlin and Arthur, how they came to be two important figures in British and Welsh history. But was that truly their first encounter? No. Their destiny had been written eons prior, when the first important civilizations had started to form.That is where it all began, during Arthur's first life.When a god walked the Earth for the first time.And when said god fell in love with a mortal.

entry.title: Le Morte d'Arthur: Destiny Calls
entry.summary:
Author: elfinnemrys

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,552Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 6

Summary: Merlin has been wandering for centuries. Waiting for the exact, unknown time that Arthur shall rise again.He becomes a lady of King Henry VIII.He meets Robin Hood and they share a fondness that once reminded him of a certain Prince.He bumps into Matthew Hopkins, the Witchfinder General, more times than he would like, dying a different death each time.But he always comes back.He falls in love and, in turn, becomes a father, a grandfather, and a lonely old man still waiting, waiting, waiting.But this is Matty's story - Merlin's granddaughter. And the ghost of Arthur follows her everywhere.

entry.title: The Sundered Soul
entry.summary:
Author: DarkWhimsy

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,074Chapters: 1/12Kudos: 23

Summary: When a sparring accident nearly kills Arthur, Merlin reacts without thinking—and exposes his magic before the entire training yard. But the fallout is interrupted by a sorcerer’s attack that rips Merlin’s soul from his body, leaving behind only Emrys: magic incarnate, stripped of warmth and memory. As Camelot reels, Arthur must face not just the politics of magic and the prophecy surrounding him, but his own feelings for the servant who has always stood by his side. Magic has always come at a cost—but Arthur never imagined the price would be Merlin himself.

entry.title: If Fates Could Change
entry.summary:
Author: Becabear25

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,821Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 19

Summary: It has been two years since morgana has been gone, and it seems for good, for now at least. Arthur has taken his rightful place again, the dragon's sword at his side. Gwen has taken her place as queen and guided the kingdom well and has taken a friend, confidant and adviser in Merlin.Queen Guinevere finds herself kidnaped, saved by this new stranger and maybe causing a little trouble on the way.Or, A new stranger finds their way to Camelot bringing new magic and new hope.

entry.title: Hold Me Gently as I Weep
entry.summary:
Author: Birnap

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,434Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 23

Summary: Arthur's never been good at expressing her feelings. Hell, half the time she doesn’t even know what those feelings are. One thing’s for certain though: she’s completely and utterly lost without Merlin.But Merlin is bound to marry a knight someday, Arthur is sure of it. And for whatever reason, the thought of seeing Merlin married, even to one of her most trusted knights, shatters her heart into a billion pieces.So basically, Arthur is a complete mess.

entry.title: it’s for you, what i never sing
entry.summary:
Author: YrAfallennau

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,767Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 12

Summary: “Arthur.”Merlin is stumbling, barefoot, ungainly, down to the water’s edge before he has even made sense of what he’s seeing. He stands there, too hopeful to breathe, and watches the spot where the water tangles.A hand. A head. Shoulders, a cape of water, and Merlin is running, crashing through the water, to the figure climbing out of the lake.They meet where the water is waist-deep, and there they stop, several feet apart.But it isn’t Arthur.It’s Merlin. Or, a grieving warlock tries to bring back his king.

entry.title: Why did it have to be you?
entry.summary:
Author: CMR1801

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,466Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 39

Summary: Merlin is dead. At least he’s pretty sure he’s dead. He has no other explanation for why no one can see him… well no one but Arthur. A man who, quite frankly, hates Merlin. Merlin has no idea what happened to him or why Arthur is the only one who can see him, but he’s going to find out. He needs answers. After all, being dead, it’s not like he has anything else to do Update on Wednesday

entry.title: From Fire by Fire
entry.summary:
Author: guinever

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,320Chapters: 8/16Kudos: 101

Summary: “Merlin. Even if you’re … even if you’re right, it doesn’t matter. It’s too late. He’s going to kill me. And I—listen to me, you idiot. I don’t want you to watch. And I don’t want you to be next.” orAfter confronting Morgause's vision of his mother, Arthur rides for Camelot, intending to make his father pay for his hypocrisy. He falls short of luck, for the King has fallen back on the counsel of his faithful Witchfinder, Aredian, who is convinced that Arthur is not Arthur, the crown prince, but a changeling, bound to Morgause's will and let loose upon Camelot to usurp Uther of his crown.As Arthur is dragged away to the dungeons, sentenced to a death by fire, Merlin must race against time to change the course of events which seem to spell out Arthur's demise. Time is scarce, however, and for all intents and purposes, it might be too late already.

entry.title: The Quiet Between Two Hearts
entry.summary:
Author: Bookbitch3457

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,843Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 2

Summary: Merlin longs for Arthur, watches him from afar as he navigates responsibilities as Prince, becomes King, takes a Queen, and dies for his kingdom. After centuries of loss and waiting, Merlin and Arthur find each other again in a quiet cottage by the lake where Merlin had laid his King to rest centuries ago. Scarred by their pasts and the weight of old wounds, they navigate a fragile path toward healing, slowly rebuilding trust and finally admitting their love.

entry.title: Trust Me This Time
entry.summary:
Author: Pikaroo

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,491Chapters: 3/7Kudos: 29

Summary: “Merlin, I'm the greatest swordsman in the five kingdoms.” Arthur boasted. “I’ve fought more battles than I can count.””I’m aware, sire.””And I’ve always survived.””Not always.” Merlin muttered.---The day Arthur dies is the day Merlin refuses to let end. Again. And again. And again. Merlin’s stuck in a spiral—a dizzying, cruel dance of death and reset. With each attempt, his heart grows heavier, his magic darker, until all he can do is break.And when the shards of his despair drag Arthur into the storm, the past and present shatter, leaving nothing but raw truth and fragile hope.Now there's no more running. Just the two of them, the end of the world, and everything left unsaid.---Updates Wednesdays

entry.title: Albion’s Wizard
entry.summary:
Author: R0se_Garden

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,353Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 58

Summary: Merlin wakes up in the middle of the Black Lake. No Arthur and no idea where or when he is. He finds himself in a place where magic is not only openly practiced but studied!Unfortunately, the school is preparing for a tournament and it’s looking deadlier by the minute. Merlin must take responsibility and fill the role he was born to play at the sacrifice of his own life. He has never understood Arthur more.

entry.title: A Dream of Spring
entry.summary:
Author: OnceUponBacktoTheFuture

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,802Chapters: 37/38Kudos: 72

Summary: When Camelot falls to a cruel king, Arthur and Merlin must find and rally their scattered friends to take back the kingdom. But after Arthur discovers Merlin's secret, he begins to see him differently. Can Arthur accept who they both are, or will they get lost in this new and dangerous Camelot, crawling with nightmares and daydreams, old friends and new enemies?
